name: element-crafter
description: A zero-dependency TypeScript library for creating HTML elements in both SSR and client-side environments

scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs:dev && npm run build:types:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs:prod && npm run build:types:prod
scripts.build:cjs:dev: tsc --outDir dist --target es2018 --module commonjs --sourceMap true --removeComments false
scripts.build:cjs:prod: tsc --outDir dist --target es2018 --module commonjs --sourceMap false --removeComments true
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.size: npm run build && npm pack --dry-run | cat

author: Tolu Adegbehingbe
